patches.content:
Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -0,0 +1,78 @@
+{
+  "name": "@zestic/oauth-react",
+  "version": "1.0.0",
+  "description": "React web adapter for @zestic/oauth-core library",
+  "main": "dist/index.js",
+  "module": "dist/index.esm.js",
+  "types": "dist/index.d.ts",
+  "files": [
+    "dist",
+    "README.md",
+    "LICENSE"
+  ],
+  "scripts": {
+    "build": "vite build",
+    "dev": "vite build --watch",
+    "test": "vitest",
+    "test:watch": "vitest --watch",
+    "test:coverage": "vitest --coverage",
+    "lint": "eslint src --ext .ts,.tsx",
+    "lint:fix": "eslint src --ext .ts,.tsx --fix",
+    "format": "prettier --write \"src/**/*.{ts,tsx}\"",
+    "format:check": "prettier --check \"src/**/*.{ts,tsx}\"",
+    "type-check": "tsc --noEmit",
+    "clean": "rimraf dist",
+    "prepublishOnly": "npm run clean && npm run build",
+    "prepack": "npm run build"
+  },
+  "keywords": [
+    "oauth",
+    "react",
+    "authentication",
+    "zestic",
+    "web",
+    "typescript"
+  ],
+  "author": "Zestic <hello@zestic.com>",
+  "license": "MIT",
+  "repository": {
+    "type": "git",
+    "url": "git+https://github.com/zestic/oauth-react.git"
+  },
+  "bugs": {
+    "url": "https://github.com/zestic/oauth-react/issues"
+  },
+  "homepage": "https://github.com/zestic/oauth-react#readme",
+  "peerDependencies": {
+    "react": "^16.8.0 || ^17.0.0 || ^18.0.0",
+    "react-dom": "^16.8.0 || ^17.0.0 || ^18.0.0"
+  },
+  "devDependencies": {
+    "@types/node": "^20.0.0",
+    "@types/react": "^18.0.0",
+    "@types/react-dom": "^18.0.0",
+    "@typescript-eslint/eslint-plugin": "^6.21.0",
+    "@typescript-eslint/parser": "^6.21.0",
+    "@vitejs/plugin-react": "^4.0.0",
+    "@vitest/coverage-v8": "^0.34.0",
+    "eslint": "^8.0.0",
+    "eslint-config-prettier": "^9.0.0",
+    "eslint-plugin-react": "^7.37.5",
+    "eslint-plugin-react-hooks": "^4.6.2",
+    "jsdom": "^26.1.0",
+    "prettier": "^3.0.0",
+    "react": "^18.0.0",
+    "react-dom": "^18.0.0",
+    "rimraf": "^5.0.0",
+    "typescript": "^5.0.0",
+    "vite": "^4.0.0",
+    "vite-plugin-dts": "^3.0.0",
+    "vitest": "^0.34.0"
+  },
+  "engines": {
+    "node": ">=16.0.0"
+  },
+  "dependencies": {
+    "@zestic/oauth-core": "^0.4.1"
+  }
+}

commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
{
  "name": "@zestic/oauth-react",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "description": "React web adapter for @zestic/oauth-core library",
  "main": "dist/index.js",
  "module": "dist/index.esm.js",
  "types": "dist/index.d.ts",
  "files": [
    "dist",
    "README.md",
    "LICENSE"
  ],
  "scripts": {
    "build": "vite build",
    "dev": "vite build --watch",
    "test": "vitest",
    "test:watch": "vitest --watch",
    "test:coverage": "vitest --coverage",
    "lint": "eslint src --ext .ts,.tsx",
    "lint:fix": "eslint src --ext .ts,.tsx --fix",
    "format": "prettier --write \"src/**/*.{ts,tsx}\"",
    "format:check": "prettier --check \"src/**/*.{ts,tsx}\"",
    "type-check": "tsc --noEmit",
    "clean": "rimraf dist",
    "prepublishOnly": "npm run clean && npm run build",
    "prepack": "npm run build"
  },
  "keywords": [
    "oauth",
    "react",
    "authentication",
    "zestic",
    "web",
    "typescript"
  ],
  "author": "Zestic <hello@zestic.com>",
  "license": "MIT",
  "repository": {
    "type": "git",
    "url": "git+https://github.com/zestic/oauth-react.git"
  },
  "bugs": {
    "url": "https://github.com/zestic/oauth-react/issues"
  },
  "homepage": "https://github.com/zestic/oauth-react#readme",
  "dependencies": {
    "@zestic/oauth-core": "^1.0.0"
  },
  "peerDependencies": {
    "react": ">=16.8.0",
    "react-dom": ">=16.8.0"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "@types/node": "^20.0.0",
    "@types/react": "^18.0.0",
    "@types/react-dom": "^18.0.0",
    "react": "^18.0.0",
    "react-dom": "^18.0.0",
    "@typescript-eslint/eslint-plugin": "^6.0.0",
    "@typescript-eslint/parser": "^6.0.0",
    "@vitejs/plugin-react": "^4.0.0",
    "@vitest/coverage-v8": "^0.34.0",
    "eslint": "^8.0.0",
    "eslint-config-prettier": "^9.0.0",
    "eslint-plugin-react": "^7.33.0",
    "eslint-plugin-react-hooks": "^4.6.0",
    "prettier": "^3.0.0",
    "rimraf": "^5.0.0",
    "typescript": "^5.0.0",
    "vite": "^4.0.0",
    "vite-plugin-dts": "^3.0.0",
    "vitest": "^0.34.0"
  },
  "engines": {
    "node": ">=16.0.0"
  }
}
